step_feedback.feedback: Good job squeezing your shoulder blades together!  Remember to keep your movements smooth and controlled.
Try to make larger, more controlled circular motions with your shoulders. Focus on inhaling deeply as you pull your shoulders back.
Your shoulder rolls are a bit jerky. Try to maintain a smoother, more controlled movement throughout the exercise. Remember to breathe deeply.

exercise_summary: You performed the shoulder rolls exercise.  Step 1 was done well, but steps 2 and 3 need more controlled circular motions and deeper breaths.  Focus on smoother movements and breathing to improve.
